com.alnton.myframecore.view.Swipe.adapter.expandRecyclerviewadapter

类 HeaderRenderer

extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for drawing headers to the canvas provided by the item decoration

    • 方法详细资料

      • drawHeader

        public void drawHeader(android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView recyclerView,
                       android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                       android.view.View header,
                       android.graphics.Rect offset)
        Draws a header to a canvas, offsetting by some x and y amount
        参数:
        recyclerView - the parent recycler view for drawing the header into
        canvas - the canvas on which to draw the header
        header - the view to draw as the header
        offset - a Rect used to define the x/y offset of the header. Specify x/y offset by setting the Rect.left and Rect.top properties, respectively.
